entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mayo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mayo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -46.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mayo Airport 06:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -46.8°C

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -51.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Ice fog. High minus 44.
entry.summary: Ice fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 44. Wind chill minus 61 this morning and minus 56 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 47 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Ice fog dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 47 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
